name: Cautious VR
description:
Made for GMTK GameJam 2021 in 48 hours

Survival top-down game, where your room fills with furniture while you try to play VR

You better check where you are, before trying to dodge an arrow in VR

The game was made in 48h by a solo dev. 

All 3d models, sounds and code were made during the gamejam.

Music: Robotertanz by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
